name: English Farms
text: Mike is one of the top fabricators in the area. They turn out precision parts for wood and pulp Mills like dampets vortexes etc med to large type pieces. Great person to do business with. They also do custom Fab work .

name: Kruzifer Delaluz
text: These guys are fantastic. They can always get what you need. Even if it isn't in stock in Mobile, they can get it in a day from the Ryerson in Birmingham, Atlanta or New Orleans. Guys in the shop are friendly and always willing to help. This is the only company I will ever buy metal from.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Kruzifer Delaluz. Hope to see you back

name: Artem Varvinets
text:
1) Get ready to stuck while getting in to their yard. Thanks Sall for pulling me out.
2) Right handed backing
3) Dont hope to get loaded fast.
1,5-2 hours.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Artem Varvinets. Hope to see you back

name: Joshua Hicks
text: Great company quick loading and unloading and awesome staff and work place highly recommended

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Joshua Hicks . Hope to see you back

name: Rebecca Spann
text: Hands down the best company to purchase metal from. A+++

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Rebecca Spann. Hope to see you back

name: Honey Bugs Apiaries
text: Great customer service, management, and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Honey Bugs Apiaries. Hope to see you back

name: HD Ryder
text:
I did business with New Market Iron Works several times in years past and the product and service was always excellent. Sadly, this is no longer the case.

My last order was in July of 2020 for small job at which time I paid a substantial deposit.As of mid April 2021 I had not  received the order or a final drawing showing what they designed in response to my comments.  This in spite of numerous requests for it.

Questions I had about my order status received responses of "It's a small job" so it is not at the top of their priorities, or "We've had problems because of COVID-19", or "Your job is probably in powder coat".

Last year they said the order would probably be delivered in mid December 2020. That would have made delivery 5 1/2 months after the order was placed. Promised responses on status & drawing did not happened.

I expressed my displeasure with my experience with them after waiting for nine and one half months to get what I ordered.  Their response was to cancel the job and refund my deposit.  I received the refund check - taped to the inside of the mailing envelope. Apparently they can't handle constructive criticism.

Overall a terrible experience and I don't recommend this company.

name: Christian Phillips
text:
The quality of their work is good, but it doesn't matter if they don't answer the phone or respond to emails.

Edit:  I originally contacted you via phone July 8th.  I would have been in touch sooner, but nobody answered the phone until the third day I called.  The woman that answered the phone told me to Email photos of the mailbox needing replacement.  I did.  I was given a quote of $335 for a mailbox post.  I am not going to send a check for $335 without any form of receipt or order form.  That price information was passed to insurance for reimbursement for the damaged mailbox (a much more pleasant experience than dealing with whoever answers your phones).  The email that was sent on the 23rd was sent by me.  It was requesting that someone from your company call me, since over the course of 15 days I couldn't get through once.  They called back the next week while I was at a job site and unable to place an order.  I asked them to call me back later or the next day and was told "No.  You'll have to call us back.  We're busy.". I gave them one more chance when I left a voicemail on the 7th of August.  This was one of two times my call went through.  That was the end of any interaction I had with New Market Iron Works.  They didn't call back over the course of the next week, so I bought a mailbox and post from Lowes instead.

resp.text: We replied to your email on 7-23-20 with all the information you requested.  I have forwarded it to you again.

name: Joshua Irwin
text: Purchased two mailboxes with posts, very helpful and great looking mailboxes.

name: Keepn It reall
text: Nice people. Great quality work.

name: Gheorghe Berdan
text:
Drivers, do not bring metal coils here, they don't have inside unloading, only outside, and they reject coils if they gets wet just little bit, until you take the tarp off
So f.... them, don't spend your time and money

name: Timothy Short
text: Ok job just not what I was looking for

name: Josh Brewer
text: This is the best shop around, I am fairly new to Off-roading and building a vehicle to do it in. Josh, Devin, and Paul have all been extremely helpful and informative. Josh helped figure out what suspension I needed for the future of my build and helped explain the pros and cons and what fits my needs and price ranges. Devon helped out anytime I called to follow up on when parts where coming in along with the progress during the day of install. Paul man this guy is the one you want looking over labor, he is very OCD about getting it right and not cutting corners and has a wealth of knowledge. Additionally all the staff at Elite are very professional and will answer any question you have, if they can’t answer it then they will make sure they get you the answer with some digging. I will maintain being a happy customer with a trusted shop which is hard to find. I can’t wait to do future building with the Elite family! Oh by the way check out all their social media and advertisements they are top notch!

name: Anthony Danshaw
text: Highly recommended! I have had engine work and tires and shocks through them! Great service and advice! Almost anything you want from lights to custom fab work, they got you covered. 100% satisfied with the quality of service and work done!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review.

name: G whitts
text: These guys are very transparent and polite. The turn around time was quicker than anticipated. Most importantly, they’re honest and do excellent work. I will not hesitate to use them in the future for vehicle needs and wants.

name: Grant Johnson
text:
Recently bought a new to me Jeep TJ. I couldn’t even drive it home (15 mins away from place of purchase) due to death wobble, loose steering wore out track bar and a laundry list of other issues. I had little to no hope for getting the vehicle street worthy and planned on just keeping it as a dedicated trailer rig. I called Elite and spoke with Josh over the phone, he said they can get it fixed up and back on the road.

They absolutely blew my expectations with the work put in on my jeep. They replaced all heim joints on the steering and track bar as well as completed a full inspection on the vehicle torque checking all nuts and bolts under the vehicle my peace of mind. They even found a few more issues that were fixed in shop for safety reasons on this inspection.

The whole process was seamless from drop off to pickup. Communication was top notch on any issue they ran into along the way. I will absolutely be returning to get my truck leveled with wheels and tires in the near future. Awesome job and awesome company. ⭐️ 12/10stars ⭐️

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Grant glad we could get your Jeep back drivable!

name: allen holmes
text: Jimmy, Alex, and Josh did an awesome job on my 2013 JK. Thanks and I will be back to get more did soon.

resp.text: Thank you Allen we look forward to working with you more!

name: John DeJarnette
text: Highly recommend!!!  Incredible job done by Elite and their professional and knowledgeable staff. Brought my 2020 TRD Pro up to speed with a 2/1 lift and some 285/70/17 Nitto Ridge Grapplers. Great work done by a great team.  Elite now has my TRD Pro looking like it always should have.

resp.text: Glad we could help you make it happen!

name: Susan Sims
text: The guys at Elite are nice and professional. They answered all my questions on building my Jeep Gladiator and steered me in the right direction for certain parts. And it was completed in 1 day!!! Already planning to return to have more modifications.

name: Randy Reeder
text: Josh and the guys at Elite Offroad were great. Super helpful and very knowledgeable. 10/10 would recommend

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your build!!

name: M O
text: Rip off.. took my Yukon in for an alignment they called and said it was ready. Then told me 119bucks payed they handed me my keys then said oh BTW we couldn't do the alignment it needed new tie rod end inners and ball joints. And said the amount I payed was for the inspection.. I didn't want an inspection but a alignment. So I took the yukon home and replaced all the parts to find out it was fine. Only had alittle play in upper right ball joint the mechanic is a joke only trying to fill his pockets this is why you can't trust auto shops.  Stay away because you are gonna get ripped off!!.  I Am Mike Overton and I Approve This Message!!!

resp.text:
Hey Mike Overton we are sorry you feel this way but we did not perform an alignment due to worn out suspension and steering components. You getting charged was a mistake by your sales person which was corrected and you were given a refund. We pride ourselves in quality work we do not change for a service we cannot perform any other shop would have performed an “Alignment” and not let you know about any front end issues and charged you.

Thanks,
Josh Balch

name: brandon horton
text: Josh and the crew did great work on my Jeep installing some items I needed to get a better ride. Also had a emergency front drive shaft problem and they was able to put the part on the same day and had it in stock. Great group of people

name: Shaun Fassina
text: The guys at Elite went above and beyond helping me get my Gladiator sorted.  It's like all the best guys at different shops decided to go in together and open  the "Elite" shop for off-roading.  They had the best prices, got the work done ahead of schedule and got it done right the very first time.  Extremely helpful and very attentive to what I wanted.  Solid advice, never tried to up sell, and was fast to respond.  Great communication even before I let them know I was going to use them.  Solid group of guys.  I have dealt with a few of the more popular off road shops in town and this was by far my best experience

resp.text: Thank you for the review Shaun we look forward to working with you more!

name: Jamie Carr
text: Josh, Patrick, Alex, and the rest of the crew here do excellent work. From basic to total custom fab. Check them out if you get in the area or online. Prices are great and fair. Local shop, not big box chain that makes you just a number in the cash register.

name: Caleb Clemons
text:
Customer service was excellent, everyone I met actually seemed to take pride in what they do and it especially showed in the work done. Got my truck leveled and labor cost was very competitive and work was done in a timely manner. Highly recommend this place, my five star experience started when they picked up the phone with an optimistic attitude. Hard to find that these day’s.
Thanks guys

name: Kyle Alvis
text: Great guys there! They really helped me decide what suspension I needed to go with to suite my needs. I have since been there multiple times to keep the build going. Their service department is second to none. They will sit and explain all specifications of your build to you. I highly recommend them and send all my friends and family to them for any of their automotive needs.

name: Stephen King
text: They We’re very professional. I dropped my jeep off and within minutes they had it a lift and showed me all of my options. They weren’t high pressure like most of the shops I visited. We went over several options, and I chose the one best for my budget. They were by far the most affordable. I checked all the 4x4 shops in the Birmingham areas and they saved me 20% minimum. I would highly recommend Elite Off-road and Performance. They are miles above the competition!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Stephen we look forward to working with you more.

name: Matthew S
text: Great experience here.  Josh did a great job getting us exactly what we wanted. High quality work. Will be back.

name: Lauren Crews
text: I had a great first experience with these guys! Very friendly staff and wonderful service. Plus pretty new tires! I will definitely be back!

name: Sarah Preston
text: Alex was very professional and took detailed notes on all of the work I wanted to have completed.

name: bradford evens
text: Josh and his crew are great people! Best shop around! They help me out on my personal vehicle as well as my box trucks.

name: Valley Tax Partners
text: Josh has been super helpful and answered all my questions. They have you and your vehicles best interest in all they do. Highly recommend getting the shake down before you purchase any vehicle bc it would’ve saved a few dollars in my situation. I’ll be back for any off road/performance needs. They have solid prices on parts and can usually have it shipped faster than most sites!

name: Jim Sellers
text: The guys here are great. My tires were worn out and they took time to ask what I liked and disliked about them and they showed me several options. They explained the differences and the pros and cons of each tire. I made my choice and they rode better than I had hoped for.  I ended up with a set of Procomp Xtreme MT2’s in a 37 and I’m happy. Thanks guys!

name: Shenendojah Sanada
text: This was an amazing experience! Rich was a fantastic guide and our driver who picked us up was very friendly, and prompt!! This was an experience I will never forget!

name: Michael Boshell
text: These guys are awesome!  Talked to them about different options for my Jeep at least 10 times and they were always willing to listen and help guide me .  Picked it up yesterday and it rides like a dream.  Even better than factory!  Go to them if you need a lift for any vehicle for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting in us with your jeep Michael.

name: Fred Hinds
text: Very happy with my build.Josh does great work.My Jeep is a 93 YJ.Josh installed new tires and wheels and a 4 inch suspension lift.Upgraded my steering.new rear drive line and new rear axles. He and his guys have done a great job.

name: Clinton Jordan
text: I called about getting an oil leak fixed thought it was 1 issue (expensive) turns out it was something not as bad. along with that they gave my jeep a full check over and found some other issues I was semi aware of but was hesitant to fix in the past. we got that taken care of as well.  All in all I would recommend this shop and its staff everytime. great customer service and amazing turnaround. I had other shops tell me up to 14 days. they had it done in 3.

name: Martha Allred
text: Thank you Josh and the guys at Elite offroad! My husband couldn't be happier with his new brush guard and running boards. Elite Offroad is very knowledgeable and helpful. I highly recommend Elite offroad to anyone I know!

name: Kyle Spena
text: DO NOT DO BUISNESS WITH THESE GUYS! They worked on my car, was there to be gone over, checked over and to fix the leaks, as well as new plugs, new rear end gear, and to address an electrical issue. The car was deilevered to me, and It leaks oil, transmission fluid, rear end fluid, and gas.. the car wont run longer then 5 min or a couple miles without drawing the battery down and dieing.. these guys charged $2,914.90 to fix my car and had it over 4 months..and came out worse then when it went in.. and of course Josh (the owner) doesn't want to stand behind his work, or pay to have it fixed correctly! This guy scammed almost $3,000 is what it boils down to, and had my car over 4 months with every excuse in the world as to why it wasn't done yet.. I do NOT recommend using this place, they are a JOKE!

name: Jeremy Christian
text: Chelsea Wrecker needed some tires mounted on our wrecker and we needed someone to be able to do the job fast and local they met both requirements and went above and beyond to get tow truck back on the road.... the guys are excellent

name: Ken Osvath
text:
Highly recommend.  Thanks once again to Elite Offroad And Performance!  We’ve had great experiences working with Josh and Alex.

Previously EOP had stayed late waiting for a towed Jeep arrival when our son’s track bar mount broke, rendering it un-drivable.

They fixed it in a timely and cost-effective manner, installing a new adjustable track bar and Teraflex front lower adjustable control arms which significantly improved drive quality.

Then recently I swung by and picked up a HIKEit X9 Throttle Controller for my Jeep, from Alex, as a cost-effective performance upgrade.

OMG!  What a difference!   Just as EOP advertised — it’s easy of use, adjustable Throttle Response with 36 settings within its 4-driving modes (Cruise, Sport, Race, Eco/4x4 Crawl) and Auto mode that adjusts dynamically to your driving along with Anti-Theft Password Protected Pedal Lock.   Thanks EOP!

name: Kevin Ingram
text: The guys at Elite Offroad and performance really go the extra mile . I enjoyed meeting them, and i would recommend them for all your offroad needs. Josh and Paul are some really good guys. Glad i got to meet them

resp.text: Thank you for the review Kevin we look forward to doing more buisness with you!

name: John McPheeters
text: The staff was more than helpful getting a competitive quote together for me and offering service above and beyond what I am used to at other shops.  Would highly recommend them for any build or add on for your off-road vehicle!

name: cody atchley
text: Josh and the guys are awesome. Jeep drives better than stock and handles great. Fixed my problem with the rear end and didn't charge an arm and a leg.

name: Michelle Gonzales
text: I am excited for Elite Offroad and Performance to open soon! I already have some ideas of what I will want upgraded on my Suburban. I will be watching the page closely for updates.

resp.text: We are excited as well! Can’t wait to help you out Thank you for the review.

name: Everett Bellfield III
text: These Guys Are Great. I  Spoke To Josh About Some Tires and He Had Them For Me The Next Day For Much Less Than I Expected

resp.text: Thank you for the review Everett and thank you for trusting in us.

name: Landon Guy
text: They did great work on my Tahoe 10/10 will go back for all the work I need

name: Jeff king
text: Quality work

name: Donovan Swafford
text: So excited for this new shop, gonna get my integra in there soon to get some stuff done to it. great shop and people!!

resp.text: Make sure to stop by for the Grand opening this weekend

name: John Smith
text: We are so excited that Elite Offroad and Performance is opening in Chelsea! Glad to have somewhere near by to be able take my jeeps.

name: Amy Gunter
text: Very knowledgeable, friendly and fast. They did some maintenance on my Jeep and I plan on visiting for some upgrades soon.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Amy!

name: Alicia Andrews
text: Ready for it to open in March . Great guys that do awesome work!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Alicia

name: ZbzDogo Outdoors
text: Friendly service, great down to earth people

resp.text: Thank you for the review Alex we look forward to working with you more.

name: Tera Clenney
text: Everyone was friendly and willing to help!

name: Marcus Bradley
text: I can honestly say Baker Metal Works & Supply is hands down the best choice for metal roofing material and metal components such as flashing, ridge, corner, eave, etc. The metal they sell is top notch and they cut it to your specifications... And can make custom trim if need be. My family owns a small construction company in the area, and we do A LOT of metal roofs... Which means we do a lot of business with Baker, and plan to do a lot more in the future!

name: Schlep H
text:
The staff in the office are friendly and helpful. Their warehouse staff made a mistake in shipping my building kit, but when the mistake was found, the salesman corrected it immediately. I would highly recommend Baker Metals in Troy, Al. My only complaint is that the warehouse workers have a seriously lackadaisical attitude, so be prepared to wait and ensure your load is loaded correctly, or opt for delivery.

Update: I went back. The staff in the warehouse were all angry and blaming the office for everything. They were rude and disrespectful the entire time I was there, to each other and customers. I will do business elsewhere from now on.

name: Steven Kruse
text: Had what i was looking for. THANKS

name: Kristin Edwards
text: Prices right!

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 star rating !

name: Joshua Parris
text: Slow service, $250 minimum order even if you only need one piece of un-cut metal. Took over half hour for them to get it to the door for me after paying.

name: jeremy henderson
text: VERY UNPROFESSIONAL... I called several times over the course of a week and a half (no answer), so I emailed (got an error message when I tried to send.), so then I sent a message on facebook (saw my message 2 weeks ago and has yet reply.). For this reason I will NEVER choose jms as a metal supplier; Limestone Steel is further but the staff, customer service is GREAT.

name: Buddy Barron
text:
One stop shopping!
This is a great company. Matt will go out of his way to help his customers .
Prices and services are five star *****

name: Garry Graham
text: Good and fast service.

name: Steven Trimmell
text: I hope I'm remembering right but awesome staff!

name: Tim Wolfe
text: Not too badd to get on loaded

name: Matt Basden
text: Bad service with new salesman from Tennessee.

name: Pam Ashley
text: One of the BEST

name: Whitney Bell
text:
Jackson and his team were great to work with. Everyone is slammed these days in the construction/remodeling business, so I did not hear back immediately, but I was not surprised as I assumed they were very busy. Once I did hear back, Caitlin was super responsive and answered all of my questions. I knew nothing about iron railings, so I had a lot of questions.
Jackson and Isaac handled the measurements, created the skeleton railing, and completed the install.  They are both very attentive to detail and personable. They made sure we understood the process and were happy with the final results.
I did receive 2 other estimates, and Allen Iron Works offered the best pricing and best timing. I am very pleased with our railing and would highly recommend them.

name: Donna Orrison
text: I wanted to update my house by taking off the wooden porch columns and railing.  I added new columns and Allen Iron Works created a custom railing and stair railing for me. It turned out absolutely gorgeous!  Jackson worked with me on the design and Isaac and Jacob were fantastic with the installation.  They truly do fantastic work.  I couldn't be more pleased with how it turned out

name: Frances Mayhall
text: The new owner of Allen Ironworks, Jackson Langston, helped us with a repair to our iron railing on our front porch. He and his employees were responsive, super professional, and gave us a fair price. They also did a great job. I highly recommend!

name: stephanie stone
text: I ordered an iron trellis and it was beautiful!  The staff were helpful, responsive to questions, and timely on delivery. I love it!  Would definitely recommend!

name: Michelle Ford
text: Friendly people and very reasonable

name: Paris Lady
text: Our cast iron mailbox pole broke from the yard guy backing his car into it. The pole was 70 years old. My Mother mainly wanted to keep the ornate work that the mailbox rested on. Little Hardware quoted a price of 287.00 to weld a new pole to the scroll work and the wait would up to 3 weeks. My Mother said "Call Allen Iron Works. They have been around for years and will give a fair price for repairs". They welded a new pole and while I waited for only 20 minutes. They charged us 40.00 which I felt was very reasonable. That was a year ago. Tomorrow I will go again for a custom flagpole that has to be made and I have complete confidence the price will be reasonable. The entire staff treated me with kindness and respect. My Mother was so excited and happy to see the mailbox iron work back in place like it hadn't changed at all since the 1940's. A businessman once told me "It's repeat business that you always want to strive for. That's the secret of success". He's right because Allen Iron Works has a customer for life with me.

name: Vivian F
text: I signed a contract on June 30th with a deposit of 50% of the cost. In mid July I called them for an installation date. They said "about two weeks out." On July 27th I called them and they said "a few weeks out." I pushed for a delivery date. They said August 17th. I canceled my order as previous promises were not upheld.

name: Liz Harding
text: I looked all over for a replacement number for my mailbox. The msilbox's manufacturer recommended this company and they were right!! Fast and wonderful customer service and the store is fascinating!!

name: Bman16
text: Awesome place, great people, Gary is a very knowledgeable person, he has a huge amount of experience in a lot of different areas. Always a great experience when we use Jones Welding! Gary and his team have got or company out of a tight spot more than once, always great with meeting deadlines!

name: Valen montano
text: The staff are nice and they work very good

name: Brandon Jackson
text: Courteous and helpful staff. Reasonable rates also

name: IRAQITRUCKER
text: Easy in and out they are very nice

name: Kenny Tran
text: This place has the best turn around time ever. I had some metal siding that I need made since Lowe’s didn’t carry it and a customer in Lowe’s had recommended me this business. This place is my go to place to buy fabricated siding from. Also the price for the siding was so much cheaper than expected.

name: Tommy Goodwin
text: Best service in the area...super friendly staff...excellent product.

name: Elijah Dishon
text: Go there all the time

name: Eric Carignan
text: They work fast and their prices are very affordable

name: Kinsley Welch
text: Friendly staff and always do great work

name: Mark Byrd
text: Does great work

name: Timothy Jones
text: Great work,true professionals

name: Home Maintenance Solutions
text: Tyler was excellent to work with.  Very helpful and professional.  I would do business with this place.  I tried others and they aren't near as helpful

name: Mark Smith
text: The service is horrible. They came to my house over a month ago and said the gutters would be fixed the next week and after numerous phone calls and promises my gutters are still not fixed. I would not recommend them at all. I had to call another company to fix them.

name: Daniel Deyette
text: Friendly folks, fast and easy load. Excellent experience.

name: clay morse
text: Not open 😕

name: Jay Johnson
text: Awesome shop with awesome products.  Whats even better is the office staff... SJ is the bomb.  She answered my questions, and the ones she didn't know, she got answers for! If you want to take your jeep to the next level and want to do it with people that care... Call Motobilt. You can look down at my reviews and notice I don't take the time to pass out reviews unless the are 100% deserved.

resp.text: Awesome thank you Jay. SJ is a great asset to our company for sure!

name: Scout Bywater
text: These Well built parts are definitely worth the money. Im going through this company for parts from now on.

name: Ed Geleski
text: Great company w. awesome products for Jeep JL 2018 fits well and looks good!

name: Richard LaFleur
text: Great but where can I get one of the Motobilt hats?

name: Deborah Isler Mercer
text: I just bought my first Jeep and I'm in the process of doing a few things to it. I told Bobby kind of what I was wanting and he showed me several options. I just picked it up this afternoon, it looks awesome!! Great customer service too! 😀

resp.text: Thank you for the business.  We are here to assist with anything you may need

name: HELIMOTO
text: Outstanding service. They always kept me up to date on my Jeep. They were extremely knowledgeable on Jeeps and what I should expect for certain mods. I'll be back for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  Let us know if we can ever help with anything.

name: Jeffrey Spellman
text: Customer service is second to none, they go way above and beyond to please the customer. Not to mention their craftsmanship is impeccable.

name: Summer Black
text: Great American made products. One of the best around!! Would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thanks Summer!!! Let us know if you need anything.

name: KEITH JEWELL Straight-Line PARKING LOT MAINTENANCE
text: a local owned company and family run

name: Brian Sullins
text: Have yall ever seen the creek that runs behind this building? Plenty of  metal and other litter back there. Its pretty sad and very upsetting to see.

name: Bud Anderson
text: Shipping Dept  folks are really nice  I load there  never once had any problems   Thanks GH

name: Brandon Parker
text:
I like the job. My department is not run the way I would run it, but I don't get to make those decisions.

The pay seems fair for what is expected of me.

I get a sense there is going to be a lot of office politics, but i try not to concern myself with such things.

All and all if you don't mind doing work and getting dirty it's a fine place.

name: Nerd Life
text: Management is a joke

name: Adam Cleere
text: Looking to support a local business worth its salt? Here they are!  I've made large and small purchases here lately and was well pleased with the cust support. Prices were fair, or better. Employees were willing to go the distance to fulfill the order. I'll be back again!

resp.text: Thank you for this great review !

name: Eligh Keuscher
text: As an employee of dixie supply I haven't been here long but I've got nothing but good things to say about dixie the co workers are easy to get along with most of the customers are pretty cool

name: Curtis Gazzier
text: Very professional every question I asked they answered I think it was very very good people

name: Michelle Byrd
text: It was much easier to place our order than it was to pick it up. 😒Much confusion and we didn't get all of our order. 👎

name: Bill Kynes
text: Outstanding. They were very busy spoke with the office manager she gave me all the information that I needed she was totally spot-on. Thank you.

name: Theo
text: Great place to deliver. Fast and courteous.

name: Carrie Norton
text: Best metal supplier in the area.  Same day service and open on Saturdays and many locations to choose from.

name: Randolphpitt
text: I've been doing business with them since the beginning of summer and I can say that they are professional and  care for their customers.  I will come back for sure

name: John Reeves
text: Very nice people.

name: Rob Howell
text: Drew was very helpful and answered all my questions

name: Randy Platt
text: I also like the fact y'all are open on Saturdays

resp.text: Thank you for this 5 star review !

name: Terry Blount
text: Great hardware store and best prices for roofing metal in the South.  I have bought three medium size orders in the past few months.  They don't need a day or two to fill orders. You just walk in and tell them what you want and 20 to 30 minutes later it's on your trailer.

name: Megan Dasappa
text: Don't shop at this hardware store. They are jerks. I brought a lock up here to get keys made by a guy named Mike. They damaged my master key to the lock, then told me my lock was rusted and that's why it won't open anymore. I use this lock every day. It wasn't damaged until I brought it here to get keys made. They told me it's my problem, not theirs.

name: LM Construction LLC
text: Very friendly and helpful. They manufacture the metal sheeting and other metal building products right there in the shop! However if you are in a hurry, not your best bet.

name: Victor Lozoya
text: Great service

name: Alyris Matthews
text:

Definitely won’t be back.

text: No common sense as far as customer service goes. Argued me and told me that the metal that was suppose to be cut all the same length yet was all at least a half inch different from each other and wasnt square was the best job they cud do. $656.00 worth of trash metal......NEVER GO HERE DONT WASTE UR TIME!!!!!!!

text: The people are very knowledgeable about their metal. Friendly and helpful. Good prices! Great service!

name: Brett Norwood
text: These guys at sloans supply are all amazing people to work with!! they have blessed me tremendously over and over again! I would recommend sloans to everyone that needs any kind of metal roofing or framing materials

text: Answered the question that we had and great prices on the supplies that we will need

name: David Willis
text: Great place friendly staff quick loading 👌 👍 😀

name: BJ Lawrence
text: Informative,  helpful, friendly,  attentive and expeditious.

name: Sheryl Blankenship
text: I needed a few pieces of roofing and a couple pieces of  transition material and the kind and helpful staff fabricated it all while I waited.  A true pleasure to do business with these folks!

name: Jeff Harding
text: Great company to work with. Highly knowledgable and friendly. I highly recomend Sloan Supply for all your metal needs

name: Taylor Taft
text: Best place to get exactly what you are looking for. Super friendly and sincere people. You will not go wrong with Sloan Supply!

name: Karen Lawless
text:
GREAT PEOPLE< AWESOME PRODUCT
just wish the hours available were better for "Working" people!

name: Kevin
text: Good to work with and everything I've purchased was measured correctly with no defects.  Thank you!

name: Robert Eadie
text: Great people! Family owned and operated!

name: Glenn McDonnell
text: I have used Sloan Supply several times for metal roofing.  Works great.

name: Elizabeth Key
text: Great customer service

name: Robert Brewster
text: These people are con artists

resp.text:
Robert's company Brewster Roofing wrote us bad check in 2018 for $3100. He is upset that we are filing charges against him. Sorry for the fake review.

Here is a link for you https://www.alabamanews.net/2018/11/19/montgomery-county-arrests-november-12-18/pic/114271/

name: Alex Key
text: Excellent metal and customer service!

name: Sunita McKenzie
text:
Cardinal made this whole experience easy.
We are so happy with the work and when they
where done all was cleaned as though they where never here. How great is that!! We love
our new roof .. Would highly recommend without a bought don’t need to look any further.
Cardinal is the way to go for professional
quality care..
Thank You John for all your help in overseeing
the job (Well Done)👍🏻

name: Amanda Harmon
text: We are very happy with our new roof. David Dailey was prompt and professional. He kept in touch to let me know of any changes in our installation date. They were able to complete the roof in one day. Cardinal cleaned up all materials and even came back the next day to make certain no nails were left behind. I would recommend Cardinal Roofing to anyone looking at repairing or replacing their roof. Call David Dailey. He was wonderful to work with.

name: Bryan Whitehouse
text: I contracted Cardinal Roofing about two years ago to replace my Roof due to some storm damage. The process was extremely easy with my cardinal rep and they worked directly with my insurance company to setup the replacement And handle the paperwork. I’ve never had a roof replaced and I was worried that the replacement would take 5-7 days like my Next door neighbors roof. However cardinal’s crew finished my roof within 24 hours (start to finish). Let me say my roof is huge so I was shocked. This part was the bonus the benefits for me was speed, warranty and the product used.  I was so impressed I recommended to my neighbors to uses them (four) and each of them had nothing but good things to say about their work and quality. So if you’re looking at a replacement i would encourage you to speak to these folks first. Sincerely BRYAN in Hoover Alabama

name: Megan Morton
text: Cardinal Roofing recently replaced our roof in Pelham and did a fabulous job. Very professional, friendly, and efficient staff. Ryan was super nice and so easy to work with. He was very accommodating to our work schedules and he also gave us step by step before, during, and after the job. He then followed up to be sure we were satisfied with the job and answered last minute questions.  The clean up crew was also awesome! Matt did an wonderful job cleaning up our property. He made sure all nails and any evidence of them being there was taken care. He even blew off the whole yard and driveway for me. I definitely give this company a fully satisfied 5 stars 😁👌🤗

name: Susan Lee
text: I called and had to leave a message and heard back from someone the next morning.  Sales rep came out and needed to send someone to get on the roof to determine the quote.  After waiting 5 days from initial call, the worker came out and got on the roof and then left.  I did not hear back from the rep, so two days later I called them.  The rep was not aware the worker had even been out and assured me he would call back with a quote that day.  That was a week after the initial call.  I never heard from him again.  Later that day I called another company and they came out the next morning and fixed the issue.  I waited a full week for Cardinal to call me back so I could inform them that it was already fixed another week passed (2 weeks from initial call) and no one has called back with a quote or any other contact.  It was an easy fix, took the other company less than 30 min to fix.  Poor service.  I did call the office today and spoke to the manager and he has assured me they will do more training with my sales rep to ensure better service.

name: Ashton Horton
text: Cardinal Roofing were great to work with. Very quick and knowledgeable. I am a young home owner and was honestly putting off replacing my roof because it seemed more daunting then it had to be. Ryan and his team helped me through the entire process. Literally put my roof on in a day, when I’ve had neighbors with teams working for a week. If you are looking for fast, friendly, reliable service give Ryan a call!

name: jonah allen
text: I had gotten approval from my insurance to replace mu roof and was hesitant on who to call, trust and ask questions. I was referred to Ryan Vidischak by a friend. He took the time to come out and go over the insurance scope of work, answer all the questions and gave me an incredible price on upgrading to a premium roof. Highly recommend him and Cardinal roofing.

name: Cory Spradlin
text: We had a very good experience using Cardinal Roofing. They helped us with our claim and were always available to answer questions. Our contact, Josh, was a huge help and kept us on track through the entire process  Highly recommend

name: Bruce Weaver
text: Great people and service. They took control of my project and exceeded my expectations. The priice was right what I had calculated it would be as well. Great Job!!!

name: adam ledbetter
text: Great service. I highly recommend them for all your welding needs. Stainless steel, aluminum, mild steel and everything in between. Great repairs and fab work from scratch.they can even cut custom jobs on the water plasma table.

name: ken hollis
text:
I had a very good experience at Valley Repair Service on 7-2-2019. We had a lawn tractor wheel and hinge break off a cutting deck. I called this service and spoke with Ken the shop foreman and he told me they could make the repair. I drove to the shop with trailer and mower in tow. Ken welded the wheel hinge back onto the cutting deck within minutes! Great service and very nice welding work!
Thank you to Ken and Valley Repair Service!

name: Rachel Sausley
text: Great group of people

name: Mark Toland
text: Best Fabrication and CNC company around. Great people very nice and very helpful. Made arrangements to have some special custom work done.

name: Ted Sharp
text: I had an air dryer that needed some aluminum welding, I talked to several welding shops and they were the only one that told me they could fix it while I waited. Not only did they fix it there repair was superior compared to two repairs I had previously. Would give a 10+ great people great work.

name: Timothy Johnston
text: Always a pleasure to visit Edwards Design and Fabrication

name: Abby Edwards
text: Very hard-working family business. Would recommend 10/10.

name: L Cutis
text: Paul did an excellent job on my smoker. I have smoked several briskets and dozens of ribs. Service is top notch.

name: Scott C. Allen
text: Amazing smoker. Deal with Tyler if you can. His dad can fly off the handle. But the craftsmanship and smoker design is second to none. My smoker has raised more money for charity than it cost to build.

name: Michael Emert
text: Tyler and his crew created a beautiful and excellent custom cooker that will last me "forever!" This rig maintains temps incredibly and I've got room to share, I can't wait to do my first whole hog in her. the 24x65 main chamber was ordered for that purpose. I'm just a backyard cook, but this cooker will "UIP" my cooking game. The Communication and Customer service is awesome and their QUALITY is 2nd to None! I'm proud to say "I am a Shirley Fabrication Owner!!!"

name: Jim Peter
text: I purchased one of their 24X50 patio models with the warmer.  The quality of workmanship is first rate.  My cooker is a great value for the price.  Tyler was wonderful to work with.  I am very happy I purchased a Shirley Fabrication cooker!

name: Gabriel Jones
text: Best place to get a custom smoker made

name: Alfred Bradley
text: Have been looking at smokers online. Then I came across you guys and you are right there is a big difference in your quality compared to others. Will be getting in touch with you guys about the price of a 24 ×60 elevated cabinet door smoker. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK

name: Shannon Schroeder
text: Amazing pits!  Top quality fabrication, techniques, and options.  1st class communication and customer service.  These less than 5 star reviews have to be bogus and placed by competitors.  Shirley Fab is the reigning king of the stickburner game for good reason.  Nobody can hold a candle to Paul, Tyler, & company!

name: J.W. McFarland Jr
text: Awesome work! Very talented.

name: Joel Lay
text: Great guys and great management..

name: Chad Knapp
text: Friendly staff turning out quality parts.

name: Clint Rice
text: This place is kool and has a lot of metal fabricating machines lasers,brakes,turrent  presses and more , nice people and great parts

name: Uncle Fungus
text: Some good Ol Boys

name: Shequonna Campbell
text: ???? Must have just passed by

name: Mark Bollinger
